scripts.version:info: node -e "const {getVersionInfo} = require('./frontend/src/config/version'); console.log('üìã VOIPServices Support Center'); console.log('üî¢ Version:', getVersionInfo().version); console.log('üìÖ Build:', getVersionInfo().buildDate); console.log('¬©Ô∏è  Copyright:', getVersionInfo().year);"
